application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) - Approx Height - 11m Approx Crown Spread Diameter - 6mLocation - Rear garden, Rear boundary (neighbours side (number 13)Service - Crown ReductionWork required- Prune clients side (overhangs) hard back to the boundaryReason - As per customer's wishes, to reduce encroachment over garden and allow more light to propertyT2 - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) - Approx Height - 10m Approx Crown Spread Diameter - 6mLocation - Rear garden, Rear boundary (neighbours side (number 13)Service - Crown ReductionWork required- Prune clients side (overhangs) hard back to the boundaryReason - As per customer's wishes, to reduce encroachment over garden and allow more light to propertyT3 - Yucca - Approx Height - 7m Approx Crown Spread Diameter - 1mLocation - Rear garden, Rear boundaryService - Crown ReductionWork required- Reduce height to around 4m and remove low branch from nearby yuccaReason - As per customer's wishes, to ease future maintenanceT4 - Cherry (Prunus avium) - Approx Height - 5m Approx Crown Spread Diameter - 3mLocation - Rear garden, Rear boundaryService - Crown ReductionWork required- Reduce and shape height by around 1.5mReason - As per customer's wishes, As part of regular cyclical maintenanceG1 - 4x Field Maple (Acer campestre) - Approx Height - 5m Approx Crown Spread Diameter - 1mLocation - Front garden, Right hand boundaryService - Crown ReductionWork required- Reduce to previous height (approx 1.5m)Reason - As per customer's wishes, As part of regular cyclical maintenanceT5 - Yew (Taxus baccata) - Approx Height - 6mLocation - Rear garden, rear right corner (15 St Margaret's Drive)Service - PruneWork required- Prune overhanging growth back to boundaryReason - to reduce encroachment, As per customer's wishes
